Name: Nevertales: The Beauty Within Collector's Edition
About the game: Just when you were finally done with work for the day, a stranger comes knocking loudly at your door. When you answer there's no one... no one except a helpless baby abandoned on your doorstep. You follow after the stranger, hoping to find some answers but are drawn into a mystery that beckons you into a castle-like mansion. Who does the baby belong to? Why were you chosen? The answers will surprise you in Nevertales: The Beauty Within, a page-turning Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game! This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you wonâ€™t find in the standard version. - Three bonus chapters - Multiple collectibles and achievements - Sugar Rush Hidden Object Puzzle - Integrated Strategy Guide
